message.content:
A 'pop_bottle', also known as a soda bottle or a soft drink bottle, is a type of container designed for carbonated beverages. 
It is typically made of clear or colored glass or plastic. 
The bottle generally has a cylindrical shape with a narrow neck and a wider base. 
Many pop bottles are adorned with brand labels and logos, and some may feature unique designs or shapes. 
These bottles are commonly used in grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, and homes, to store and serve carbonated drinks. 
The visual characteristics of a pop bottle include its shape, size, color, labeling, and material. 
The shape, size, and labeling of a pop bottle can vary depending on the brand, type of drink, and region.
